attributes.action: Legislate for a UK 'crime of aggression' law to try Tony Blair for the invasion of Iraq
attributes.additional_details: This petition calls on the government  to legislate at the earliest opportunity, after ratifying the Kampala amendments to the ICC Statute of Rome, for the retrospective prosecution in UK courts of 'crimes of aggression' against other states so that Tony Blair and others complicit in the decision to invade Iraq can finally face justice and the authority of the United Nations Charter be upheld
